author: Tezza Tucker
comment: Had this a while and it doesn't see my watch at all. This is the only app that doesn't see my watch. Was looking forward to trying this out, but guess it's not for me.

author: Ross MacRae
comment: Like the app, but don't like the constant notification when swiping up. How can this be removed. Thank you

author: Craig Ogier
comment: Updated. New release works as advertised on wear 2.0 Very useful. Makes it so much easier to show off my watch face

reply.author: Cloudy Day Apps
reply.content: Hi, a new version has been released that has support for Android Wear 2.0,. Sorry for the delay in updating, thank you for using KOKO.

author: Julian Legere
comment: Works perfectly on the Huawei Watch!

author: Joe Mckinney
comment: Used to work perfect.  Buggy for sure since updates.

reply.author: Cloudy Day Apps
reply.content: Hi, a new version has been released that has support for Android Wear 2.0,. Sorry for the delay in updating, thank you for using KOKO.

title: Used to work perfect.

author: Roswitha Stein
comment: Since the last update the app keeps ignoring the timeout I set - the screen dims after the default five seconds instead.
title: Buggy after Update

author: Michael P.
comment: Enjoy this modern Watch app for controlling display timeouts! Latest update to even do it from my Nexus6 P to the Huawei Watch! Cool
title: Super Watch Wear timeout app

author: dan Bdan
comment: 😃 time out control for all my watch faces...thanks
title: cool..just what I have been after

author: Rob Danks
comment: Just what you need to show those Watchfaces off,excellent stuff 👍...shame we can't have an emergency mode where the screen is able to be indefinitely off/in 'dim' mode for when battery is critical too...
title: Top App

author: Jonathan Poston
comment: Excellent app which makes my Moto 360 2 even better! Thanks so much!
title: Screen stays on as long as I wish....  👏

author: Chris Singale
comment: I have no complain so far. I set the timer to "10 seconds" and 10 seconds is what I get. Worth the price
title: Works perfectly

author: Dan McGovern
comment: Why this isn't an option in device settings is beyond me. Thankfully this app exists. I can show of my Android Wear without having the screen constantly turn off! Highly recommended for anyone with a Wear device.
title: First app installed on my Wear!

author: Randy Van Dreesen
comment: Since the latest update the screen sometimes dims after 5 seconds even though I have selected a higher value. Annoying!
title: Unreliable after update

author: Randall Goetz
comment: Worked perfectly before AW2 update on Urbane 1. Hope they fix it to work with AW2  Update - After developer has updated to work with AW2, very happy to have this fine app working again.

reply.author: Cloudy Day Apps
reply.content: Hi, a new version has been released that has support for Android Wear 2.0,. Sorry for the delay in updating, thank you for using KOKO.

author: dante jimenez
comment: Not working on android wear 2.0 please fix. Huawei smartwatch

reply.author: Cloudy Day Apps
reply.content: FYI, new version supports Android Wear 2.0, thanks for using KOKO.
